entries.title: In Peru, protesters were tear-gassed after president called for truce
entries.description: In Peru, thousands of protesters took to the streets and were met with tear gas hours after President Boluarte called for a “truce" after 2 months of protests.

entries.title: Heavy snow causes chaos in Japan and South Korea as cold snap sweeps through Asia
entries.description: Frigid winter weather gripped East Asia for the second straight day on Wednesday, causing several deaths and multiple injuries in Japan and a scramble for flights out of South Korea’s resort island of Jeju following delays by snowstorms.

entries.title: Biden announces U.S. will send 31 Abrams tanks to Ukraine
entries.description: President Joe Biden announced that the United States is sending 31 Abrams tanks to Ukraine in its war against Russia.

entries.title: Satellite images hint at scale of Russian mercenary group's losses in Ukraine
entries.description: The number of graves at a cemetery used by Russia's notorious mercenary Wagner Group has dramatically grown over the last two months, satellite images show.

entries.title: Breaking down why Biden administration changed position on sending tanks to Ukraine
entries.description: In an about-face, President Joe Biden announced that the United States will send 31 M1 Abrams tanks to Ukraine after previously being opposed to the move. NBC News' Kristen Welker explains why the Biden administration reversed course.

entries.title: ‘I’m very happy’: Zelenskyy welcomes German tank decision
entries.description: While on camera for an interview with NBC News’ partner Sky News, the Ukrainian president was told that German Chancellor Olaf Scholz had green-lighted the export of Leopard 2 tanks to bolster Ukraine’s defenses against Russia.

entries.title: Germany approves sending Leopard tanks to Ukraine
entries.description: In an address to Germany’s parliament, Chancellor Olaf Scholz announced that Berlin will send German-made Leopard tanks to Ukraine. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has been calling on European allies and the U.S. to provide weapons to Ukraine amid the ongoing war with Russia.

entries.title: Pope Francis criticizes countries with anti-LGBTQ laws
entries.description: In an interview with the Associated Press, Pope Francis criticized countries that criminalize homosexuality, saying “God loves us as we are.” The pontiff went on to attribute negative attitudes toward the LGBTQ community to cultural backgrounds and said bishops in particular need to undergo a process of change to recognize the dignity of everyone.

entries.title: Indian university reports power cut ahead of Modi documentary screening
entries.description: Indian students said they would show again a BBC documentary about Prime Minister Narendra Modi that the government has dismissed as propaganda after a Tuesday campus screening was disrupted by a power cut and intimidation by opponents.

entries.title: Ship sinks between South Korea and Japan; 9 remain unconscious
entries.description: Ships searching in wind-whipped waters between South Korea and Japan have picked up at least 14 of the 22 crew members from a cargo ship that sank early Wednesday.

entries.title: Pope Francis says homosexuality is a sin but not a crime and criticizes 'unjust' anti-gay laws
entries.description: Pope Francis criticized laws that criminalize homosexuality as “unjust,” saying God loves all his children just as they are and called on Catholic bishops who support the laws to welcome LGBTQ people into the church.

entries.title: A 'red flag' for Holocaust knowledge in the country where Anne Frank hid from the Nazis
entries.description: A new survey from the Claims Conference suggests a “disturbing” lack of awareness about the Holocaust in the Netherlands, where Anne Frank hid from the Nazis.

entries.title: Biden admin plans to send tanks to Ukraine in a major reversal
entries.description: The Biden administration is preparing to announce that they are sending M1 Abrams tanks to Ukraine, according to three senior U.S. officials. NBC News’ Courtney Kube has details on the major reversal.
